page.title: 13Brackley estate agent
page.content: We interviewed a local estate agent about her job. She must work very hard because she has long hours (Mon-Fri 9.00-4.00,Sat 9.00-5.00, Sun 11.00- 4.00). She likes the job very much - especially meeting lots of people and matching houses to people. Estate agents do house valuations and write about them so that they can sell them to other people. When writing a description they need to include age, construction, location, number of rooms, gardens and outbuildings. The price of a house depends on these but also on whether the type of house is popular. Stone cottages in pretty villages are very "sought after" so they cost more than ordinary houses in towns. The most popular time of year to move is spring. People like to settle in before a new school year begins.
